I find `NetworkClient#handleDisconnection` will be called by `NetworkClient#processDisconnection` which will printed warn message ```log.warn("Bootstrap broker {}:{} disconnected", node.host(), node.port());``` if it exists `InFlightRequest` and I do not think that exists `InFlightRequest` if we set wrong broker.
